sentences: Ta tegi oma elu kõige ränksama aastakümneks.
Muidugi, see pole mõte olla elusana nörgas hoonestikus.
Ma arvan, et ta on endiselt elusana, kuigi tal on raske tervis.
context: The word 'elusana' is used to describe someone who is alive or still in good condition despite difficult circumstances. It can also mean being intact or unharmed.
